verses.name: Habakkuk 1:1
verses.text: The burden which Habakkuk the prophet did see.

verses.name: Habakkuk 1:2
verses.text: O Lord, how long shall I cry, and thou wilt not hear! even cry out unto thee of violence, and thou wilt not save!

verses.name: Habakkuk 1:3
verses.text: Why dost thou shew me iniquity, and cause me to behold grievance? for spoiling and violence are before me: and there are that raise up strife and contention.

verses.name: Habakkuk 1:4
verses.text: Therefore the law is slacked, and judgment doth never go forth: for the wicked doth compass about the righteous; therefore wrong judgment proceedeth.
